value:
$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|Hmm... Is it possible this isn't an
Idolasphere but an entirely new and
different world?$k$pEveryone, listen up! I realized
something I need to tell y—$k$p$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|Tsubasa! Grr... I should've expected
nothing less from you... Of course
you just HAD to keep up with me...$k$p$WmMPID_つばさ,ch12_01_Tsubasa_F_Normal,Face|You're doing great, Ellie! But...I'm
not gonna lose to anyone today!$k$p$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|It's no use! They're too wrapped up
in their competition to listen to me...
I guess we have no choice, then.$k$p$WmMPID_まもり,ch12_03_Mamori_F_Normal,Face|*sigh*$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|Ugh... You're a strong one! But I'm
not done yet...$k$p$WmMPID_まもり,ch12_03_Mamori_F_Normal,Face|...That's enough.$k$pPLEASE STOP it already!$k$p$WmMPID_つばさ,ch12_01_Tsubasa_F_Normal,Face|H-huh? What is it, Mamori?$k$p$WmMPID_まもり,ch12_03_Mamori_F_Normal,Face|What is going on? You go to another
world and just start making trouble
for all the people there? For what?!$k$pCalm down! Let's think about this...$k$pWe should be supporting each
other. That's what friends do...
Isn't it?!$k$p$WmMPID_霧亜,ch12_04_Kiria_F_Normal,Face|Y-you're right, Mamori... We got so
fired up, we lost sight of what's
really important.$k$p$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|Yeah, I'm sorry... It's all my fault...$k$p$WmMPID_つばさ,ch12_01_Tsubasa_F_Normal,Face|No, no. I played a part as well...
Sorry for causing you all trouble...$k$p$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|...I've been thinking about it, and if
we want to have both music and a
story, why not do a music video?$k$pEllie can play the lead role in the
story, and the song can feature
a duet between Kiria and Tsubasa!$k$p$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|Interesting idea! I won't have as many
lines, but...it'll give me a chance to
show off my screen presence...$k$p$WmMPID_つばさ,ch12_01_Tsubasa_F_Normal,Face|And I'd get a duet with Kiria? Oooh!
I hadn't thought of that!$k$p$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|If it's decided, let's get to work!
Itsuki, since you had the idea, you
can be the director!$k$p$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|I-I'm the director? I didn't ask for
all that responsibility, Ellie!$k$p$WmMPID_まもり,ch12_03_Mamori_F_Normal,Face|Hey, uh...sorry I yelled at everyone!
I didn't want to be mean... I just want
us all to get along. But now we are!$k$p$WmMPID_霧亜,ch12_04_Kiria_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pI wonder if I still get to wear that
cute, frilly dress...$k$p$Sbs150|
